title: Synthesized novel chromogenic reagent and sensor: Detection and identification of dichlorvos
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Ashwin D. Gedam, Manish M. Katiya, Madhukar G. Dhonde, Kapil S. Ganorkar, Vijay J. Thakare, Prashant R. Mandlik, Nitin L. Jadhao, Jayant M. Gajbhiye, Ravi Kumar, Nayana Vaval
